@graph.name: Whole Grain Fusilli with browned Mushrooms and Spinach. vegan - Vegan Richa

itemListElement.name: Whole Grain Fusilli with browned Mushrooms and Spinach. vegan

@graph.name: Spinach and Browned mushroom fusilli
@graph.description: Easy weeknight meal. Use whole grain or gluten-free fusilli or other pasta. Vegan Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups chopped/sliced mushrooms (white, medium portabellas, shittake, any of choice)
1-2 teaspoons herbs of choice (I used fresh thyme and basil)
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes ( or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Fusilli or any pasta of choice according to instructions. Reserve some of the water
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Fusilli or any pasta of choice according to instructions. Reserve some of the water

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add 1 tbsp oil and heat on low-medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add 1 tbsp oil and heat on low-medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mushrooms, a pinch of salt, Mix well to coat and cook partially covered for 10-15 minutes until mushrooms start to brown. Stir 2-3 times in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mushrooms, a pinch of salt, Mix well to coat and cook partially covered for 10-15 minutes until mushrooms start to brown. Stir 2-3 times in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Add spinach, mix and cook covered till wilted, 3-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add spinach, mix and cook covered till wilted, 3-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the salt, pepper and herbs and a 1/4 cup or more reserve water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the salt, pepper and herbs and a 1/4 cup or more reserve water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well, let simmer on low, covered for 2-3 minutes. Fold in the extra virgin olive oil and minced garlic and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well, let simmer on low, covered for 2-3 minutes. Fold in the extra virgin olive oil and minced garlic and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta, mix, taste, adjust salt, spice, herbs. Take off heat after a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add pasta, mix, taste, adjust salt, spice, herbs. Take off heat after a minute.
